ClientPackage.NetworkInterface

Class ClientService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientPackage.NetworkInterface.ClientService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientRMIService, ClientSocketService

    public abstract class ClientService
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class is one in which the methods that will be ovverrided from deployments in Socket and RMI are written. Created by Emanuele on 09/05/2016.
